# Introduction

This site is a compendium of the data and code used for analysis of the demographics of Palau as part of the "Demographic Data and Analysis" (GEMDDA) course within the Faculty of Spatial Sciences at the University of Groningen. On this site you will find links to RMarkdown Workbooks outlining the code used to compute various demographic calculations and visualustions, links to the raw data in .csv form, and links to downloadable Excel worksheets outlining how to compute these demographic calculations and visualustions in a conventional spreadsheet software.
